Dave Matthews

Dave Through the Years

  • Born on January 9, 1967 in Johannesburg, South Africa
  • Spent many of his early years living between the United States and the United Kingdom before returning to South Africa around age 10
  • Left South Africa for the United States after graduating high school to avoid military service
  • Moved to Charlottesville, VA in 1986 where he later formed the Dave Matthews band in 1991
  • Married in 2000 and currently resides in Seattle, WA with his wife and three children
  • In addition to a brilliant musical career, Dave has acted in several roles on television and in film

You can read more about Dave's life at his wiki, or better yet listen to his music
